DataElement.preferredDefinition: Date of completion of the SF-36, a 36-question survey for measuring health status and outcomes from the patient's point of view.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A 36 question survey for measuring health status and outcomes from the patient's point of view. Designed for use in surveys of general and specific populations, health policy evaluations, and clinical practice and research. Measures 8 health concepts (score 1 - 6), to yield a total score.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A 36 question survey for measuring health status and outcomes from the patient's point of view. Designed for use in surveys of general and specific populations, health policy evaluations, and clinical practice and research.  Measures 8 health concepts: 1) Limitations in physical activities because of health problems, 2) Limitations in usual role activities because of physical health problems, 3) Bodily pain, 4) General health perceptions, 5) Vitality (energy and fatigue), 6) Limitations in social activities because of physical or emotional problems, 7) Limitations in usual role activities because of emotional problems, 8) Mental health (psychological distress and well-being). (from Medical Outcomes Trust)

Concepts.definition: A 36 question survey for measuring health status and outcomes from the patient's point of view. Designed for use in surveys of general and specific populations, health policy evaluations, and clinical practice and research.  Measures 8 health concepts: 1) Limitations in physical activities because of health problems, 2) Limitations in usual role activities because of physical health problems, 3) Bodily pain, 4) General health perceptions, 5) Vitality (energy and fatigue), 6) Limitations in social activities because of physical or emotional problems, 7) Limitations in usual role activities because of emotional problems, 8) Mental health (psychological distress and well-being).

Property.preferredDefinition: Predetermined sets of questions used to collect data - clinical data, social status, occupational group, etc. The term is often applied to a self-completed survey instrument.

Concepts.definition: Predetermined sets of questions used to collect data - clinical data, social status, occupational group, etc. The term is often applied to a self-completed survey instrument.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Process and results associated with self-reported measures and instruments, surveys, other tools

DataElementConcept.changeDescription: Change to NCI Thesaurus concept for SF-36

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: Date as required for Clinical Trials Monitoring Service submissions.  Exchange format is YYYYMMDD.  Display format is DDMMMYYYY, with the month display the first three letters of each month (Jan, Feb, Mar, etc.).

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: a particular day specified as the time something has, or will, happen.

Concepts.definition: The particular day, month and year an event has happened or will happen.

ValueDomain.changeDescription: 8/30/17 jk Transferred context, added CSI and reg status, released per Round 5 finalization task. --- Display and exchange formats are based on CTMS reporting requirements v.3.02 and all subsequent versions of these guidelines.

DataElement.changeDescription: Released status approved by CCR on 2/5/2005.
